name: AppleBoi
description:
Hey kid, 'ya like apples?
I hope so because you're going to be one in this small game I made.

It's very simple! You play as an apple and you have to dodge small rocks that are falling from the sky. 

I'll probably add some more content later on, but for now I think it's pretty much finished. I would also be very grateful for some feedback. DM me on Twitter @LaxxNacken17 or use the comment section.

Have fun!
